channel.title: Modern Business 2
channel.description: Nexx - Multi Purpose Business WordPress Theme

item.title: Contact form 1

<label> Your Name (required) [text* your-name] </label>

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded: This is the Parent page for the homepage sections. Don't edit this page, instead, go to Settings - Reading and set it as Front Page.

item.title: Slider (modern business 2)
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" full_height="yes" content_placement="middle" parallax="content-moving" css=".vc_custom_1497345196824{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-image: url(http://nexarthemes.com/nexx/moder-business-2/wp-content/uploads/sites/17/2017/04/slider-modern-business-2.jpg?id=174) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn"]

Nexx Modern Business

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeIn" css=".vc_custom_1493202438473{margin-top: -15px !important;}"]Nexx is packed with the best website building features: Visual Composer, Revolution Slider, Theme Options Panel, and 80+ page elements.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="DISCOVER" style="custom" custom_background="#d60274" custom_text="#ffffff" align="left" css_animation="fadeIn" css=".vc_custom_1496905715160{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Fthemeforest.net%2Fitem%2Fnexx-multi-purpose-business-wordpress-theme%2F19851428||target:%20_blank|"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: About Us (modern business 2)
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:
[vc_section full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" parallax="content-moving" css=".vc_custom_1497346247309{background-image: url(http://nexarthemes.com/nexx/moder-business-2/wp-content/uploads/sites/17/2017/04/about-us-modern-business-2.jpg?id=186) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_row content_placement="middle"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1497345572347{padding-top: 135px !important;}"]

About Us

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

Nexx is an excellent theme series allowing you to build your site the easy way, and it lets you tell your story in a powerful way.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap="20" css=".vc_custom_1497345580675{padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 190px !important;}"][vc_column css_animation="fadeInUp" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1492001972991{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 35px !important;padding-left: 35px !important;border-left-color: #eeeeee !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #eeeeee !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #eeeeee !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #eeeeee !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]MARKETING[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492001886771{margin-top: -35px !important;}"]

Our first passion is Marketing

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493202782560{margin-top: -25px !important;}"]Nexx is a flexible multi-purpose theme for every business and creative professional. A great collection of homepages, researched and developed for the most popular business niches. Use ‘One-Click’ import to save valuable time.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation="fadeInUp" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1492002209415{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 35px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #eeeeee !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #eeeeee !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #eeeeee !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #eeeeee !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]PHOTOSHOP[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492002312708{margin-top: -35px !important;}"]

We love to create with Photoshop

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493202729949{margin-top: -25px !important;}"]Inner-pages in Nexx theme should help you cover most of your content needs, thereby saving you precious time. You can create the perfect header for your website. Choose between various layouts and behaviours. Nexx also provides 3 Layout Styles.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation="fadeInUp" width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1492002234815{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 35px !important;padding-left: 35px !important;border-left-color: #eeeeee !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #eeeeee !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #eeeeee !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #eeeeee !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]BRANDING[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492002350533{margin-top: -35px !important;}"]

Our second passion is Branding

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493202872157{margin-top: -25px !important;}"]Container Breakpoint Controls. Switch quickly between full width or boxed and control the container width on the majority of device screens. You choose and set the resolution breakpoints and the container size. You can customize everything.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]

item.title: Services (modern business 2)
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row content_placement="middle"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1497345261080{padding-top: 185px !important;}"]

Our Services

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

Use ‘One-Click’ import to get a head start and save valuable time when building your website. Just try and convince yourself.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1491518916438{padding-top: 55px !important;padding-bottom: 65px !important;}"][vc_column css_animation="fadeInUp" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1491520167838{border-right-width: 1px !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: solid !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

01

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492632173058{margin-top: -160px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;}"]

Develop

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493204801913{margin-top: -35px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;padding-left: 9px !important;}"]

When you purchase Nexx Theme, you get professional support and lifetime updates and there’s also a full time support team.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation="fadeInUp" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1491518314997{border-left-width: 1px !important;border-left-color: #cecece !important;border-left-style: solid !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

02

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492632194227{margin-top: -160px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;}"]

Branding

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493204599429{margin-top: -35px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;padding-left: 9px !important;}"]

Good ranking requires relevant content, but it’s our duty to ensure proper code helping you score better on Google.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1497345525552{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 195px !important;}"][vc_column css_animation="fadeInUp" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1491520174977{border-right-width: 1px !important;border-right-color: #ffffff !important;border-right-style: solid !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

03

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492632214497{margin-top: -160px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;}"]

Creative

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493204614180{margin-top: -35px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;padding-left: 9px !important;}"]

Our support team is here to help you, usually answering within one business day. You also get lifetime updates.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column css_animation="fadeInUp" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1491518314997{border-left-width: 1px !important;border-left-color: #cecece !important;border-left-style: solid !important;}"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

04

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492632239672{margin-top: -160px !important;padding-left: 5px !important;}"]

Photoshop

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1493204627834{margin-top: -35px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;padding-left: 9px !important;}"]

With more than 600 high-quality fonts, you can customise your website to any style of feel. Just take a closer look.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/6"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Icons (modern business 2)
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1497346374757{padding-top: 180px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

Main Features

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

You can effortlessly create your website with One Click Install. Content, images, theme options and even sliders are automatically imported.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1492510601840{padding-top: 55px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_row_inner equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle"][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_icon type="linecons" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-data" color="custom" size="xl" align="center" css_animation="fadeInUp" custom_color="#d60274"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

marketing

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492633061191{margin-top: -30px !important;}"]

We are treated as "marketing team", not as an outside agency.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_row_inner equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle"][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_icon type="linecons" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-params" color="custom" size="xl" align="center" css_animation="fadeInUp" custom_color="#d60274"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

web design

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492633080890{margin-top: -30px !important;}"]

We create websites for any device, regardless of the resolution.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1497347082666{padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 155px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_icon type="linecons" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-news" color="custom" size="xl" align="center" css_animation="fadeInUp" custom_color="#d60274"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

page options

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492633113640{margin-top: -30px !important;}"]

Control page height and paddings, as well as the background color.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_icon type="linecons" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-bulb" color="custom" size="xl" align="center" css_animation="fadeInUp" custom_color="#d60274"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

ideas

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1492633139037{margin-top: -30px !important;}"]

We packed Nexx Theme with a lot of impressive features.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Testimonials (modern business 2)
item.dc:creator: admnexar
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row content_placement="middle"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1497347390716{padding-top: 185px !important;}"]

Testimonials

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

Almost every layout or styling option can be set using the Theme Options Panel. Go on and see impressive features in action!

Contact Us

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp"]

Nexx is a unique flexible multi-purpose theme for every business and creative professional. A great collection of homepages and inner pages, researched and developed for the most popular business niches. Build your own site and earn more clients now.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation="fadeInUp" css=".vc_custom_1497348607206{padding-bottom: 140px !important;}"]
